plot: When Lex Luthor gets elected US President, he uses the threat of an oncoming kryptonite meteor striking Earth as a rationale to frame Superman.

f.role: Power Girl in Superman/Batman: Public Enemies. When the two meet Toyman (a 13-year old Japanese kid), Power Girl is staying as far away from him as she can, presumably due to an incident that Toyman described as involving "X-Ray goggles". Later when they view his rocket (designed to take out a meteor heading towards the planet), this exchange occurs:

Mentioned twice in Superman Batman Public Enemies. Superman, Batman, and Power Girl are enlisting the help of Japanese teen-supergenius Toyman, and Power Girl arrived several hours earlier. Superman and Batman meet her when they first enter Toyman's tower, but she refuses to go back in with them. We soon find out why.
 Later, Toyman is readying his Superman/Batman robot-rocket to launch:
Most Common Superpower: Power Girl is involved, so of course. Lampshaded twice by Toyman, including an apology for an incident with his experimental x-ray goggles.
Most Common Superpower: Power Girl, natch. Lampshaded twice by Toyman, including an apology for an incident with his experimental x-ray goggles.
The Chick: Katana, later sharing the role with Starfire.

name: Superman/Batman: Public Enemies
